Package model

Class Inventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Inventory
  • public class Inventory
extends java.lang.Object
    _____________________________________________________________________
    Inventory Class
    ---------------------------------------------------------------------
    This class creates inventory ObservableList objects for parts and Products
    This class includes methods to facilitate the following:
    * Add new Parts and Products to the Inventory ObservableLists
    * Search through Inventory ObservableLists to find a Part or Product
    * Update variables within Parts and Products to the Inventory ObservableLists
    * Delete Parts or Products from Inventory ObservableLists
    * Return full lists of Part or Product Inventory ObservableLists
    * Generate unique Part and Product IDs

      ---------------------------------------------------------------------
      Loop through allParts ObservableList and find matching partID
      static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Part> lookupPart​(java.lang.String partName)
      Lookup PART Method - @param: partName
      ---------------------------------------------------------------------
      Uses filteredParts ObservableList as temp variable to hold all Parts matching the search parameter
      Clear the filteredParts ObservableList @ start of every call
      Loop through allParts list and add all matching Parts to filteredParts
      If matches found return filteredList
      If no matches found return null
      static Product lookupProduct​(int productID)
      Lookup PRODUCT Method - @param: productID
      ---------------------------------------------------------------------
      Loop through allProducts ObservableList and find matching productID
      static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Product> lookupProduct​(java.lang.String productName)
      Lookup PRODUCT Method - @param: productName
      ---------------------------------------------------------------------
      Uses filteredProducts ObservableList as temp variable to hold all Products matching the search parameter
      Clear the filteredProducts ObservableList @ start of every call
      Loop through allProducts list and add all matching Products to filteredProducts
      If matches found return filteredProducts
      If no matches found return null
      static void updatePart​(int id, Part selectedPart)
      Update Part Method
      ---------------------------------------------------------------------
      Loop through allParts to find Part Object with matching PartID, if found
      update that entry in the allParts list with new Parts Object info
      static void updateProduct​(int id, Product selectedProduct)
      Update Product Method
      ---------------------------------------------------------------------
      Loop through allProducts to find Product Object with matching ProductID, if found
      update that entry in the allProduct list with new Product Object info

      • lookupPart

        public static Part lookupPart​(int partID)
        Lookup PART Method - @param: partID
        ---------------------------------------------------------------------
        Loop through allParts ObservableList and find matching partID

        Parameters:
        partID - used to find part with matching partID
        Returns:
        returns Part Object matching search partID or null if no match found

      • lookupPart

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Part> lookupPart​(java.lang.String partName)
        Lookup PART Method - @param: partName
        ---------------------------------------------------------------------
        Uses filteredParts ObservableList as temp variable to hold all Parts matching the search parameter
        Clear the filteredParts ObservableList @ start of every call
        Loop through allParts list and add all matching Parts to filteredParts
        If matches found return filteredList
        If no matches found return null

        Parameters:
        partName - used to find product with matching partName
        Returns:
        returns Part ObservableList matching search partName or null if no match found

      • lookupProduct

        public static Product lookupProduct​(int productID)
        Lookup PRODUCT Method - @param: productID
        ---------------------------------------------------------------------
        Loop through allProducts ObservableList and find matching productID

        Parameters:
        productID - used to find product with matching productID
        Returns:
        returns product Object matching search productID or null if no match found

      • lookupProduct

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Product> lookupProduct​(java.lang.String productName)
        Lookup PRODUCT Method - @param: productName
        ---------------------------------------------------------------------
        Uses filteredProducts ObservableList as temp variable to hold all Products matching the search parameter
        Clear the filteredProducts ObservableList @ start of every call
        Loop through allProducts list and add all matching Products to filteredProducts
        If matches found return filteredProducts
        If no matches found return null

        Parameters:
        productName - used to find product with matching productName
        Returns:
        returns Product ObservableList matching search productName or null if no match found

      • updatePart

        public static void updatePart​(int id,
                              Part selectedPart)
        Update Part Method
        ---------------------------------------------------------------------
        Loop through allParts to find Part Object with matching PartID, if found
        update that entry in the allParts list with new Parts Object info

        Parameters:
        id - uses partID as search parameter to find match in allParts
        selectedPart - if a match is found this object is used to update entry in allParts list

      • updateProduct

        public static void updateProduct​(int id,
                                 Product selectedProduct)
        Update Product Method
        ---------------------------------------------------------------------
        Loop through allProducts to find Product Object with matching ProductID, if found
        update that entry in the allProduct list with new Product Object info

        Parameters:
        id - uses productID as search parameter to find match in allProducts
        selectedProduct - if a match is found this object is used to update entry in allProducts list

      • deletePart

        public static boolean deletePart​(Part selectedPart)
        Delete Part Method
        ---------------------------------------------------------------------
        Parameters:
        selectedPart - used as object to delete from allParts ObservableList
        Returns:
        return true if object is deleted, return null if not found
